headline: Engineering Leader at Google
summary:
Principal Machine Learning Engineer Manager with experience in Solution and Product development. 
Demonstrated strong One Team mindset, ability to address ambiguity and create clarity for investment 
team/ partner team. Demonstrated Palpable and Positive energy in leading through a period of uncertainty.

Member of the Engineering Leadership Team responsible for leading strategic investments 
and growing the teams capabilities.

experiences.title: Engineering Leader at Amazon
experiences.description:
Envisioned & Lead Amazon Pinpoint area with a team of 10 SWE/Data Engineers/Data Analysts.

Amazon Pinpoint is a flexible and scalable outbound and inbound marketing
communications service. You can connect with customers over channels like email, SMS, push, voice or in-app messaging. 

Goals
Data Democratization: Enable customers to easily self-serve their data needs in advancing their growth 
applications at scale.

Deliver New Insights: Provide data and insights at various grains that lead marketers and customers to the next improvements to their marketing communications strategies.

Data Freedom: Marketers and customers can leverage top-notch technology tools to access this data or export it for use with their preferred analytics tool

Data Integrity: Provide reliable, up-to-date data to help our customers/marketers respond more efficiently to their customer needs.

Who?
Customers/marketers want to self-serve analytics at various grains => to better understand what their customers want => to drive business outcomes.

Data Scientists want to build ML models to optimize customer engagement at scale.

Customers/marketers want to use ML models to improve engagement at scale and drive business outcomes.

Customers/marketers want to leverage console to look at insights via data plane.

Customers want to export the data to their analytics/BI tools for self-serve

Why?
• To drive informed decision making
• To understand customers and trends
• To provide smarter services and products
• To improve internal operations
• To create additional revenue

experiences.title: Principal Machine Learning Engineering Manager
experiences.description:
Envisioned and Built a DataProduct DevOps Platform to automate the DevSecOps Lifecycle for DataProducts.
DataProduct is any application of data that is of value to business. DataProduct can be of type AI/ML Models, Azure Data Lake Datasets, PowerBI Report, Tabular Models, SSRS Reports. DevOps for Dataproducts brings Data Engineers, Data Analysts and Data Scientists together to deliver a quality DataProduct by democratizing Data Engineers, Data Analysts and Data Scientists to operationalize a DataProduct without any Software Engineers help. Operationalization covers,

100% Automation of Practices and Controls across the Engineering and Operations Lifecycle (Build, 
Test, Deploy, Run). Adhering to Modern Engineering best practices makes sure, Coding & Security best practices are followed consistently across all the DataProducts, Telemetry is captured at right grain to get meaningful insights,	Proactive and reactive monitoring/alerting is enabled, 	Quality of DataProduct is consistent during Build and Run phases, Deployment Automation with prescriptive recommendations and selection of serving  infrastructure, SDL activities and Component Governance are taken care. 

Governance: Metadata Management, Quality, Discoverability, Access Management and Production Observability

Regulatory Compliance: SOX, GDPR
Lineage Tracing
Proactive & Reactive Fragmentation detection

Metric/Ways to measure success:  Platform helps our partner teams to answer following business driver questions.
•	How many Dataproducts are there in your Inventory?
•	How do we know how and where our Dataproducts are used? (Lineage Tracing)
•	How do we make sure there are no duplicate Dataproducts being built to solve same Business Problem? (Fragmentation)
•	How do we know that we are building quality Dataproducts? 
•	How do you make sure all DataProducts adhere to Governance and Regulatory standards?

experiences.title: Sr. Machine Learning Engineering Manager
experiences.description:
Envisioned and Built a Machine Learning Platform to automate the DevSecOps Lifecycle for Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence Models and Services. 

The platform comprises capabilities for Data Quality and Feasibility analysis, 
Generating prescriptive ML/AI model templates, Test automation, Prescriptive code generation for Engineering Fundamentals (Security, Telemetry, Monitoring), Build & Deployment automation, and Runtime model quality & performance insights.

The Machine Learning Platform has been adopted and is being used actively by teams across Microsoft IT (End User Services, Supply Chain, Business Operations, Platform Engineering and Operations etc), who have realized efficiency gains in reducing the time to deploy and operate ML/AI models as scalable services and products from weeks to hours.

experiences.title: Sr. Software Engineering Manager
experiences.description:
Led the Engineering team, across Redmond, India, Finland and Ireland, responsible for Nokia S30 and Lumia Manufacturing and Supply Chain Services.
Responsibilities of my team included :

1. Identifying and owning business process flows

2. Identifying Synergies between Microsoft Supply Chain and Nokia Supply Chain systems and unifying
these systems to provide a Global Manufacturing and Supply Chain Services.  

3. Leading the NOKIA and Microsoft technology integration for the first migration project, including migrating services to Microsoft Azure and Microsoft Platforms

experiences.title: Technical Lead
experiences.description:
Key contributor to the success of Intel Software Partner program and Intel Atom Developer Program; Formulated, presented and implemented Business strategies towards success of ISPP and IADP

Designed and developed the reusable quality control measures that saved 0.1 M$ over a span of one year through automation of localization work leading to a reduction in turnaround time

Included in prestigious “Hall of Fame” for displaying customer orientation and quality of work in 2008. Efforts were recognized for leading the Silverlight team whose work was identified as the best innovation in Q4’ 2008

Envisioned, kick-started and participated in Tech-Talk sessions leading to improvement in collective ownership of project tasks by 100% and resulting in lower defect rates and showstopper bugs in the execution cycle.

Mentored less experienced developers (including Contract workers) in design sessions that led to improved ownership in the implementation phase.

Recognized as Agile Practice Expert based on contribution in Agile process across different projects. Identified as Chief influencer towards successful adoption and implementation of Agile Model throughout the organization

Helped HR team recruit best talent from renowned institutes like IITs and NITs.

Active contributor and participant in the Eureka Innovation framework established at Intel. Appreciated for researching and demonstrating new technologies and Proof of concepts.

accomplishment_patents.title: CONVERTING VISUAL DIAGRAMS INTO CODE
accomplishment_patents.description: This invention allows an architectural diagrams/illustration/design from any source to be converted directly into its equivalent, structured, compliable code in any language of choice without requiring multiple task from multiple persons. \nOnce inside the code solution, the invention also makes suggestions for the user to leverage the latest cloud features, patterns and best practices in an automated fashion and can also make corresponding code implementations.

certifications.name: DeepLearning Specialization: \tImproving Deep Neural Networks: Hyperparameter Tuning, Regularization and Optimization
DeepLearning Specialization: Neural Networks and Deep Learning
DeepLearning Specialization: Structuring Machine Learning Projects
